Title: Bride of Silence
Director: Minh Phuong Doan, Thanh Nghia Doan
Actors: Truong Ngoc Anh, Nguyen manh Thang, Truong huu Quy, Tran Minh Thanh
Plot: A gorgeous young woman endures the wrath of her strict family and fellow villagers when she becomes pregnant out of wedlock and refuses to name the father. 17 years later, her son strives ...
